Saloni Rajeev Kumar

My name is Saloni Rajeev Kumar, and this is my personal blog. It currently has 1 posts in 1 categories which combinedly have 386 words, which will take an average reader ( WPM) approximately 1.93 minutes to read. The most recent post is “Linux Directory Structure” which was published on 12 May 2018. The last commit was on Saturday, 12 May 2018 at 05:59 PM UTC.

I am a B.Tech student in IT at IIITM, Gwalior. I work in the fields of machine learning, deep learning, web development(front end and a bit of php), linux and python developments and competitive coding. I believe in the development of the ever growing open source community.

I was born in Lucknow, UP and brought up in several cities in India (My father has a transferrable job) which include Jodhpur, Chandigarh, Patiala, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Bhopal, Delhi, Nagpur, Ludhiana and Bengaluru. Majority of my education has been from Kendriya Vidyalaya schools. I am a die hard foodie <3.

I look forward to challenging opportunities to tingle my grey cells. Nothing is better than a chance to risk it all (I have had to format my pc several times becuase of this)
